actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of the Southern Methodist University School of Law Leasing Trust, and its successor trust, the Legal Educational Trust of Dallas.

summary.text: Provides that for purposes of the Internal Revenue Code a named organization and its successor shall be treated as a tax-exempt charitable organization and not as a private foundation.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of the Southern Methodist University School of Law Leasing Trust, and its successor trust, the Legal Educational Trust of Dallas.
